submission_guidelines.details: Full Papers and Technical Notes should be written in the ACM format.

formats.description: Original and mature research work within the scope of the conference.
Shorter contributions focusing on system contributions and technical work.

summary.event: EICS 2026: The 18th ACM SIGCHI Symposium on Engineering Interactive Computing Systems
summary.description: EICS 2026 is an international conference devoted to engineering interactive computing systems and their user interfaces, addressing software quality factors.

publication_details.published_in: Journal Proceedings of the ACM on Human-Computer Interaction (PACM - EICS series)

important_dates.event: Submission Deadline for Full Papers and Technical Notes

topics_of_interest: Modelling, specification and analysis of interaction and interactive systems
Methods, processes, principles and/or tools for building interactive systems
Formal methods within interactive systems engineering
Bridging the gap between engineering and design practices.
Computational techniques for designing and evaluating interactive systems
Engineering hardware or software integration in interactive systems
Engineering interactive systems for diverse user groups
Applying AI technologies in methods, processes and tools for building interactive systems.
